May 9, 1998 D Northern Counties Open Contest
Northern Counties Open Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
northern-counties-open-contest
None
Webster Theatre, Arbroath Best section 1 band - Longannet Colliery. Best section 2 band - Tayport. Best section 3 band - Turriff. Best section 4 band - Forfar. Most entertaining band - Perthshire Brass. Best soloist - B.Keachie (cornet) Kilmarnock. 14 bands competed.
